channel.title: midori on Tokyo, endless city
channel.description: Recent content in midori on Tokyo, endless city

item.title: Tree and Skytree
item.description: The Tokyo Skytree is visible for much of the length of the long and thin Sumida River Park. A very pleasant park on a cool spring morning. At this point the east (right hand) half of the park is in Kotobashi and the west side is in Midori. You can weave in and out of a dozen different districts as you walk along its winding paths.
